text: Sattam Sirikkiradhu (Tamil : சட்டம் சிரிகிறது; English : Law is laughing) is a 1982 Tamil drama film, directed by T. R. Ramanna. The film stars Vijayakanth, Jyothi, Prathap K. Pothan, Aruna Mucherla and Ramji in lead roles. The film had musical score by Vijaya T. Rajendar. ==Cast== *Vijayakanth *Jyothi *Prathap K. Pothan *Aruna Mucherla *Ramji *Manorama ==Soundtrack== Soundtrack was composed by T. Rajender.https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/sattam- sirikiradhu-movie-ep/851624576 *Kanakambaram Poo Vangu-T. S. Kalyanam *Malare Malare Unakindru-P. Susheela *Kangal Kallanadu-S. P. Balasubrahmanyam S. Janaki *Malai Mugapinil- Kalyanam S. Janaki ==References== ==External links== Category:1982 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Tamil-language films Category:Films directed by T. R. Ramanna Category:Films scored by T. Rajendar
title: Sattam Sirikkiradhu
